IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper Class Reference

this is an internally used class which is useful for wrapping an unmanaged (C++) persistor type in order to expose it in the .NET SDK More...

String ^ GetVersion ()
 Gets the profile persistor version to be used. The default empty value means the default persistor version will be used. More...
 
int SetVersion (String^ sVersion)
 Sets the profile persistor version to be used. An empty value means a default version will be chosen automatically. More...
 

Detailed Description

this is an internally used class which is useful for wrapping an unmanaged (C++) persistor type in order to expose it in the .NET SDK
